caption: \it The $\frac{\mathbb{R}\times[-1,1]}{\mathbb{Z}_2}$ geometry realizing the 4d lift of $B_c$ has an orbifold singularity. It can be smoothed out to the shape on the right hand side of the picture, with the orbifold singularity mapped to an interior point. We pick the initial corner so that no co-dimension 2 defect is present at the interior point.
